transforms.code:
options = [{ "label": "None", "value": -1  }]
    pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
    
    for row in pydata:
        label = row["label"]
        value = row["value"]
        options.append({ "label": label, "value": value })
        
    return options

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	iconPath = payload.get('iconPath')
	
	self.props.text = iconPath

# implement your handler here
	color = payload.get('color')
	self.props.text = color

config.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger('upsertEqStatesConfig')
	
	try:
		params = self.view.custom.Params
		#system.perspective.print(params)
#		for key, value in params.items():
#			if not value: raise ValueError('The value for key {} is empty'.format(key))
				
		system.perspective.print(params)
		res = mes.config.sp.addEditLineState(params)
		#system.perspective.print(res)
		if res is not True: raise ValueError('Sproc call failed. ' + str(res))
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshTree')
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshStatesTable')
		system.perspective.closePopup(self.view.params.ModalName)
		system.perspective.closePopup('colorPicker')
	except Exception as e:
		errorParams = {
			"ModalName": "ErrorModal",
			"ErrorMessage": str(e),
		}
		
		system.perspective.openPopup("ErrorModal", "GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal", errorParams)
		logger.warn('There was an error: ' + str(e))
